mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "BTEAM"."ORDER_ING" (MEMBER_NO, GOODS_NO, GOODS_OPTION_NO, STORE_NO, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_SIZE, ORDER_CNT, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_COLOR,ORDER_PRICE,ORDER_GOODS_NAME) VALUES (#{member_no},#{goods_no}, (select goods_option_no from goods_option where goods_no = #{goods_no} and goods_color= #{order_color} and goods_size=#{order_size}) , #{store_no},TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),#{order_size},#{order_cnt},#{order_status},#{order_color},#{order_price},#{order_goods_name})
